titleStmt.title: An exhortation to styrre all Englyshe men to the defence of theyr countreye. made by Richard Morysine
titleStmt.author: Morison, Richard, Sir, d. 1556.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Thome Bertheleti typis impress. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Appears at reels 125 and 1837 (Bodleian Library copy).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
